meanings.definition: A device that transfers electrical energy from one circuit to another through electromagnetic induction.
meanings.sent1: The transformers in the power station help distribute electricity to homes and businesses.
meanings.sent2: I need to replace the transformers in my electronics to prevent power surges.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel thought the transformers were toys and tried to play with them.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as transformers, changing his mood from sad to happy in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The transformers hummed softly as they efficiently converted energy for the entire building.

meanings.definition: A fictional race of sentient robots that can transform into vehicles, animals, or other objects.
meanings.sent1: The transformers fought bravely to protect the city from the alien invaders.
meanings.sent2: My favorite character in the movie is one of the transformers who can turn into a sports car.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled with delight as they watched the transformers dance in the parade.
meanings.sent4: The transformers stood tall, their metal bodies gleaming in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The transformers' leader inspired loyalty and courage in all who followed him.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that transforms or changes something.
meanings.sent1: She was a true transformer, turning old furniture into beautiful works of art.
meanings.sent2: The teacher was a transformer of young minds, shaping them into future leaders.
meanings.sent3: The comedian was a master transformer of awkward situations into hilarious jokes.
meanings.sent4: His smile was a transformer, brightening the mood of everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The sunset was a stunning transformer, painting the sky with vibrant colors.
